      • nameAndLocation

        public E nameAndLocation(List<String> pathSegments)
        Sets the path representing the location and name of a filesystem resource to the provided value. This is a shortcut for calling name(String) and location(List)
        Parameters:
        pathSegments - one or more path segments
        Returns:
        the same builder instance
        See Also:
        name(String), location(List)

        the same builder instance
